name: Crazy Chicken (itch) (Momschale)
description:
Hey! 

This is Crazy Chicken! A chaotic game about your life in a city with a box full of .... CHICKEN?! 

They are escaping and running around in your home! Try to catch them and put 'em back into their box! Collect points and be fast or else your home will be a total mess!

Dive into this Virtual Reality Game and interact with the environment and the chicken.

Important Information!

Make sure you have enough space! This game is meant to be played on a "real-life scale". This means you should run around your room, so set up your guardian in the size of your room! If you don't have enough space, you can also use the thumbstick to move around.

Quick Controls: 

Grip: Grab objects or the chicken in the room

Left Thumbstick: Walk around

Right Thumbstick: Turn around
